data.current_summary: Returns Activities around a given location
data.description_suggestion: Searches for tours and activities available around a specified geographic location. Accepts latitude and longitude coordinates as input parameters to define the search area. Returns a collection of Activity objects with details including pricing, ratings, and booking information. Results are filtered based on proximity to the provided coordinates.
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague about the search mechanism. Description is completely empty, missing critical information about inputs (coordinates), outputs (Activity collection), and the search behavior. Added specificity about coordinate-based search, return type, and what information is included in results for better AI agent understanding.

Added clarity about the square/bounding box search methodology, input parameters (boundary coordinates), output type, and use case differentiation to help AI agents understand when to use this versus the point-based search.

data.current_summary: Returns Activities around a given location
data.summary_suggestion: Search activities within geographic square boundary
data.description_suggestion: Searches for tours and activities within a defined geographic square (bounding box) area. Accepts latitude and longitude coordinates for the square boundaries as input parameters. Returns a collection of Activity objects with details including pricing, ratings, and booking information. This endpoint is useful for searching activities across a larger geographic region compared to point-based searches.
data.reasoning: Original summary doesn't distinguish this operation from ListActivities - it's unclear that this uses a square/bounding box approach. Description is empty. Added clarity about the square/bounding box search methodology, input parameters (boundary coordinates), output type, and use case differentiation to help AI agents understand when to use this versus the point-based search.

data.current_summary: Retrieve one activity by its id
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific activity using its unique identifier. Returns a complete Activity object containing pricing, availability, ratings, description, location details, and booking information. Use this endpoint after identifying an activity of interest from search results to get comprehensive details before booking.
